    Our PLoS/Mendeley competition team is growing

    Karthik Ram (his blog Inundata here) has just joined Carl Boettiger and I to develop two R packages further, and to develop a third package that may be called something like rOpenSci to fully search all open reference software, open journals, open databases, etc. online.

    See here for the PLoS/Mendeley competition.

    Github site for rplos and RMendeley.
